content: this free pattern is available exclusively at leahmichelledesigns com 1 this sideways triangular scarf starts with 3 cast-on stitches increases to the middle and then decreases back down to 3 stitches - great for those knitters who don t enjoy casting on or binding off hundreds of stitches the increase used is the kfb stitch and the decrease is k2tog the increases and decreases are worked on every right side row creating a true triangular shape it s an easy garter stitch project with a slipped stitch edge this is a great one-skein project and is shown here in malabrigo rastita the colour is cereza any amount of yarn can be used weigh the total amount of yarn before beginning and periodically throughout the increase section begin decreasing when half the yarn is left find these other free patterns at leahmichelledesigns com dappled shawl 2 blended shawl 3 totally triangular scarf 4 jagged triangular scarf 5 sugar plum cowl 6 effortless slouch hat 7 bulky ribbed cowl 8 join the leah michelle designs ravelry group 9 for pattern support announcements promos and kals subscribe to the leah michelle designs newsletter 10 for pattern announcements and subscriber-only discounts 1 http //www leahmichelledesigns com 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/dappled-shawl-3 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/blended-shawl 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/totally-triangular-scarf 5 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/jagged-triangular-scarf 6 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sugar-plum-cowl-4 7 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/effortless-slouch 8 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/bulky-ribbed-cowl-5 9 http //www ravelry com/groups/leah-michelle-designs 10 https //us3 list-manage com/subscribe u=e32de1565695fb08e29aa80f0&id=6d8f779113
